summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CodeChain platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), but critical frontend authentication issues preventing access to protected routes.

ui_bugs.issue: Users can register successfully but cannot access protected routes (dashboard, problems, hackathons) - redirected to login page
Login form submission doesn't redirect to dashboard even with valid credentials

integration_issues.issue: Authentication token not being properly stored/retrieved in browser, causing protected route redirects

design_issues.issue: Google OAuth button exists but missing expected data-testid attributes for testing

passed_tests: Code submission with mocked Solidity compilation
Landing page loads with dark theme
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical authentication flow issues: 1) JWT token persistence in browser for protected routes, 2) Login form redirect functionality, 3) Add missing data-testid attributes for Google OAuth buttons
